nodes.text: Reaper Squadron was a starfighter squadron active during the Clone Wars. Its members flew Z-95 Headhunters and became legendary. They were mentioned in a section on the design lineage of the T-65B X-wing starfighter in Official History of the Rebel Movements, Volume One. Decades after the end of the war, the wreckage of one of the squadron's fighters was recovered from Castilon's Karavian Trench by Synara San.
Reaper Squadron was first mentioned in the Star Wars Resistance episode "Bibo".
